#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
char *mul(char *m,char *n);
char t[3000];
main()
{
 char a[105],b[105];
 cin>>a>>b;
 char x[1001][5000]; 
 strcpy(x[1],a);
 for(int i=2;i<=atoi(b);i++)
 {
  char *u=mul(x[i-1],a);
  strcpy(x[i],u);
 }
 cout<<x[atoi(b)]<<endl;
 int s=0;
 for(int i=0;i<strlen(x[atoi(b)]);i++)
 {
  int y = x[atoi(b)][i]-48;
  s=s+y;
 }
 cout<<s;
 return 0;
}
char *mul(char *m,char *n)
{
 //cout<<m<<" "<<n<<endl;
 for(int i=0;i<2999;i++)
 {
  t[i]=' ';
 }
 t[2999]='\0';
 int x = atoi(n);
 int l=strlen(m)-1;
 int res=0;
 int k=2998;
 for(int i=l;i>=0;i--)
 {
  int y=m[i]-48;
  res = x*y+res;
  int z = res%10;
  res=res/10;
  //cout<<x<<" "<<y<<" "<<z<<" "<<res<<endl;
  t[k--]=z+48;
  //cout<<t[k+1];
 }
 while(res>0)
 {
  int v =res%10;
  t[k--]=v+48;
  res=res/10;
 }
 for(int i=k+1;i<=2999;i++)
  t[i-k-1]=t[i];
 return t;
}
